metadata.dc:author: Segarra, Juan
Mariño, Laura P
Rubio, Soraya
Gaetano, Mauro
Fraga, Juan I
Ossés, José A
metadata.dc:description: Complete patency of the omphalomesenteric duct is one of the most uncommon presentations of omphalomesenteric related anomalies. We herein present a newborn with a faecal umbilical discharge due to the above-mentioned anomaly. We describe the diagnostic and therapeutic options and the results of a literature review.
metadata.dc:title: Persistencia del conducto onfalomesentérico.
[Patent omphalomesenteric duct].
